1. Charleston International Airport

Charleston International Airport

Built with Observable Framework, this work in progress dashboard delivers a dynamic view of Charleston International Airport (KCHS) flights, combining JavaScript visuals, data mapping, and a Python ETL pipeline for daily historical snapshots.

Historical trend data snapshots and live gate map data may contain inaccuracies.

Other live data is pulled directly from an API that powers the official CHS website.
